data.text: @AndyFitchet It should hopefully pass soon. It took a few weeks after I had it!
@AndyFitchet It is really the pits. My reactions to post covid lasted 4 days and then the medicine kick in.

@AndyFitchet Hi Andy, I’m currently 19 weeks post COVID. I’m living with a few symptoms that haven’t gone, the main one Chronic Fatigue Syndrome. Listen to your body, it’s so incredibly easy to say, it’s a battle I fight a lot. People don’t get it, but only you know what you can do! 🙏🏻
@AndyFitchet It's really frustrating... I was OK after week 6...
@AndyFitchet @katemassey77 Also feeling guilty about the fatigue and the stuff you didn't do at the height of covid. Read up about long covid and seek help as soon as needed.
@AndyFitchet Hope it lets up soon. It’s brutal. Take care of yourself 💕
@AndyFitchet It will get better!  Took me about a month to get back to what passes for normal around here. ;)
